project
@nekofar/warpcast

overview
TypeScript client for interacting with Warpcast's experimental API surface. The library is
unstable and intended for exploratory integrations.

setup and runtime
- Node.js 18+
- pnpm install
- pnpm format:check
- pnpm lint
- pnpm test
- pnpm build

public api index
src/index.ts -> version - package version
src/client/sdk.gen.ts -> getUserOnboardingState, getUserByFid, getDirectCastInbox, getUserAppContext,
getUserPreferences, getHighlightedChannels, getFeedItems, getUser, getUserFollowingChannels,
getSuggestedUsers, getUserFavoriteFrames, getUserByUsername, getChannelStreaksForUser,
getUnseenCounts, getUserThreadCasts, getChannelFollowersYouKnow, markAllNotificationsRead,
getNotifications, setLastCheckedTimestamp, getDirectCastConversation,
categorizeDirectCastConversation, getDirectCastConversationMessages,
setDirectCastConversationMessageTtl, updateDirectCastConversationNotifications,
getDirectCastConversationRecentMessages, sendDirectCastMessage,
directCastManuallyMarkUnread, removeDirectCastMessageReaction, addDirectCastMessageReaction,
unpinDirectCastConversation, pinDirectCastConversation, discoverChannels,
getAvailableInvites, getSponsoredInvites, getRewardsLeaderboard, getUserRewardsScores,
getRewardsMetadata, getBookmarkedCasts, getUserStarterPacks, getSuggestedStarterPacks,
getStarterPack, getStarterPackUsers, getChannel, getChannelUsers, getFollowing, getFollowers,
getMutualFollowers, getTopFrameApps, getTopMiniApps, getVerifications, getMutedKeywords,
muteKeyword, unmuteKeyword, unlikeCast, getCastLikes, likeCast, undoRecast, recastCast,
attachEmbeds, getCastRecasters, getCastQuotes, getCurrentUser, searchChannels, getDraftCasts,
createDraftCasts, deleteDraftCast, deleteCast, getCastsByFid, createCast, getAllChannels,
getChannelDetails, getChannelFollowers, getUserFollowedChannels,
checkUserChannelFollowStatus, getChannelMembers, removeChannelInvite, getChannelInvites,
acceptChannelInvite, inviteUserToChannel, getChannelModeratedCasts,
getChannelRestrictedUsers, unbanUserFromChannel, getChannelBannedUsers,
banUserFromChannel, unfollowChannel, followChannel, moderateCast, unpinCastFromChannel,
pinCastToChannel, getDiscoverableActions, getDiscoverableComposerActions, unblockUser,
getBlockedUsers, blockUser, getAccountVerifications, getCreatorRewardWinners,
getUserPrimaryAddress, getUserPrimaryAddresses, getStarterPackMembers, sendDirectCast,
getUserByVerificationAddress, getDeveloperRewardWinners, getAppsByAuthor, getDomainManifest,
getMetaTags, getFarcasterJson, getOwnedDomains, getApiKeys, createApiKey, revokeApiKey,
getConnectedAccounts, getProfileCasts, getUserLikedCasts, getMiniAppAnalyticsRollup,
inspectMiniAppUrl, inspectImageUrl, exportMiniAppUserData
src/client/zod.gen.ts -> numerous Zod schemas such as zProfilePicture, zUser, zChannel,
zNotificationsResponse, zCast, zCreateCastData and many more covering request and response
validation for every endpoint
src/client/schemas.gen.ts -> JSON schemas including ProfilePictureSchema, UserSchema,
FeedItemsResponseSchema, CastSchema and other structures used by the API
src/client/types.gen.ts -> over 600 generated TypeScript types like ProfilePicture, User,
DirectCastConversation, FeedItemsResponse, Cast, ApiKey and hundreds of additional data
shapes used throughout the client

public api details
name: getUser
kind: function
module: src/client/sdk.gen.ts
summary: Get user information
description: Retrieves detailed user information based on FID.
params:
  options: Options<GetUserData, ThrowOnError> - Request configuration
returns: Promise<GetUserResponses> - Response wrapper
usage:
```ts
import { getUser } from "@nekofar/warpcast";
const { data } = await getUser({ params: { fid: 1 } });
```
source: src/client/sdk.gen.ts L838-L859

errors and edge cases
Network failures or invalid authentication tokens from Warpcast may result in rejected
promises.

security and safety
Client communicates with Warpcast's private APIs. Do not expose credentials in untrusted
environments.

conventions
- ESM modules
- Prettier formatting
- ESLint static analysis

examples
```ts
import { createCast, getUser } from "@nekofar/warpcast";
const { data: user } = await getUser({ params: { fid: 1 } });
await createCast({ body: { text: "Hello from Warpcast" } });
```

limitations
API surface is auto-generated and may change without notice. Many endpoints require
Warpcast authentication and may not be accessible to the public.

license
Apache-2.0
